comments.body:
i was wondering, perhaps we could normalize location before, e.g.:

self.location = normalize_location_name(self.location)

but just a suggestion. not sure perhaps that would have some disadvantages...

diffHunk:
@@ -1,1 +162,166 @@                if update_tags:
                    changed = True

                if self.location and normalize_location_name(self.location) != results['location']:
                    self.fail("Resource group '{0}' already exists in location '{1}' and cannot be "
